column1: '''The Ring Goes South''' is the twenty-fifth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and the thirty-first of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
